name: Stratagem: Soldiers
description:
Create your army.  Defend your realm.  Stay out of the encroaching darkness.

Choose the units you allocate to the squads within your army.

Offer battle or accept that offered by other opponents in this 2-player game.  Internet connection required to play.

Pay heed to the environment and the abilities of different troop types.

Simple gaming :

  • Multiplayer cross platform - PC / Android
  • 2 player battles
  • Each player has one army to form 3 squads with 98 groats to spend on troops- the groats you get for free ;)
  • No power-ups
  • No accrued bonuses
  • No health bars
  • No ads
  • No IAP's
  • Just straight up head to head game play

Have fun! :)
